{
	dataproduct(
		id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
	) {
		requesters
    access {
      subject
      granter
      revoked
    }
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.dataproduct.access.*.revoked=NOTNULL
ENDOPTS

{
  "data": {
    "dataproduct": {
      "requesters": [],
      "access": [
        {
          "subject": "user:santa@nav.no",
          "granter": "mock.anderson@email.com",
          "revoked": "sometime"
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
